sentences.en: Many African tribes believe in reincarnation.
sentences.cn: 很多非洲部落相信转世再生。

sentences.en: He recommended monotheism but believed in reincarnation.
sentences.cn: 他宣传一神论，却相信转世再生。

sentences.en: Another little girl, believed to be the reincarnation of her grandmother, was obsessed with sewing.
sentences.cn: 另外一个据说是她祖母转世化身的小女孩痴迷于缝纫。
